name: True or False - Knowledge Battle
description:
True or False? You know more about birds than your best friend?

True or False? Your partner knows more about the Olympics than you?

Find out the answers to these questions and so many more when you challenge yourself in this multi-level quiz app. Test your knowledge and speed as you battle against the clock in a solo quest. Alternatively, the multiplayer mode means you can challenge your family and friends on the split screen option to find out who really does know more.

So how good is your trivia knowledge? Find out through the wide range of topics that also include arts, royalty, ice-hockey, religion, Europe, the calendar, kids stuff and cricket. Throw down the challenge to see once and for all who should be crowned the trivia king or queen.

Your brain muscle will get a workout as you challenge yourself against the clock with this fun True or False quiz. Do you know more about ice hockey or Europe? Chose your topics to challenge your current knowledge and also learn amazing new facts to add to your repertoire that you can later slip into conversation to impress and amaze your friends.

How fast can you choose your answers? Compete against the clock time and time again to better your score and increase your knowledge, then stun your friends with your impressive knowledge of interesting and unusual facts and trivia.

There is no registration or tricky rules to follow. Simply download and play. All you need to do is decide whether the facts are true or false – simple! Or is it? Watch out for the false but believable statements designed to confuse and trick you, throwing you off the scent of the true answers!

So what are you waiting for? Download the app now to start having endless hours of fun. Best of all, this is not only a fun game; you’re also training your brain.
